reviewText: This is an odd film for fans of the Trailer Park Boys. Basically, they engage in role reversal. Ricky is the straight guy, Julian is not the brains of the outfit and Bubbles is the drunk out of control idea man. The story involves the creation of Swearnet, a new network for the ex stars of the TPB. There are some cameos by minor celebrities and some nudity. Randy is there and naked often, but the other characters aren't really seen. Some disturbing scenes of Bubbles pleasuring a one eyed man in a cowboy hat.  Don't let this odd effort dissuade you from Season 8 of the Trailer Park Boys, which is awesome.
If you are a fan of the Trailer Park Boys, this is your movie!!!!
Cool to see the guys playing another character in this movie, very funny!

It's the Boys.  If you expect anything different, you'll be upset!
Of course it's 5 stars, it's the BOYS!
happy to see them out of their "Trailer Park Boys" characters.
If you're into the off color stuff but want something a little different from Trailer Park Boys, this is it.
love the Trailer Park Boys. This is a must own for fans and newbies alike! guiness record for the sweariest movie ever!!
Came on time and movie is funny a hell gotta love TPB's
